description: This is a React functional component for the main page of a note-taking application. It manages state for notes, active note ID, and search query, and renders Sidebar and NotePanel components. It includes logic to fetch notes based on search input and maintain the current selection.

methods.name: loadNotes
methods.description: Asynchronously fetches notes matching the current search query and updates the notes state, maintaining the selected note if it still exists.
